sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import './Coin.css' const Coin = () => { const params = useParams() const [coin, setCoin] = useState({}) const url = `https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/${params.coinId}` useEffect(() => { axios.get(url).then((res) => { setCoin(res.data) }).catch((error) => { console.log(error) }) }) return (

{coin.name}

Rank #{coin.market_cap_rank}
{coin.image ? : null}

{coin.name}

{coin.symbol}

{coin.market_data.current_price}

1h 24h 7d 14d 30d 1yr
) } export default Coin
